uvi.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.14.16
uvi.description:
cfg80211: fix management registrations locking

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.16 by commit 3c897f39b71fe68f90599f6a45b5f7bf5618420e, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 6cd536fe62ef58d7c4eac2da07ab0ed7fd19010d. For more details please see the references link.
